scripts.runner:pkg:mac-arm64: pnpm runner:build && pkg dist/runner/devmode-runner.js --target node18-macos-arm64 --output dist/coda-runner-macos-arm64
scripts.runner:pkg:mac-x64: pnpm runner:build && pkg dist/runner/devmode-runner.js --target node18-macos-x64 --output dist/coda-runner-macos-x64
scripts.runner:pkg:win-x64: pnpm runner:build && pkg dist/runner/devmode-runner.js --target node18-win-x64 --output dist/coda-runner-win-x64.exe
scripts.runner:pkg:linux-x64: pnpm runner:build && pkg dist/runner/devmode-runner.js --target node18-linux-x64 --output dist/coda-runner-linux-x64
scripts.runner:package-local: rm -rf dist/apps/runner-desktop && rm -f public/runner/coda-runner-companion-mac-arm64.dmg && rm -rf .deploy apps/runner-desktop/.deploy && rm -rf apps/runner-desktop/node_modules/@coda/.ignored_runner-core && pnpm --filter @coda/runner-desktop install && pnpm --filter @coda/runner-desktop deploy apps/runner-desktop/.deploy --legacy && pnpm --filter @coda/runner-desktop run build && rm -rf apps/runner-desktop/.deploy/dist && cp -a apps/runner-desktop/dist apps/runner-desktop/.deploy/dist && (cd apps/runner-desktop/.deploy && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --ignore-scripts --prod false && pnpm exec electron-builder -- --publish never) && cp dist/apps/runner-desktop/coda-runner-companion-mac-arm64.dmg public/runner/
